page.body:
Documentation
Wiki Up-to-date documentation can be found in the ScalaQuery Wiki at GitHub.
Examples The ScalaQuery Examples repository contains a ready-to-run sbt project with simple, documented ScalaQuery programs.
Slides Slides for the ScalaQuery talk by Stefan Zeiger at Herbstcampus 2011 (in German, with some English text and lots of code) are available here:
in PowerPoint format (789 kB): Relationell auch ohne SQL.pptx - Use this version if you can because there are lots of animations on the slides which are lost in the PDF
in PDF format (1.85 MB): Relationell auch ohne SQL.pdf
API Documentation
Version 0.9.4
Version 0.9.1
Version 0.9.0
